section.name: 6 - Principle of Relativity
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Explain what a reference frame is, and determine whether a reference frame is inertial.
  • Calculate the center of mass velocity for a system.
  • Explain what quantities are the same or different for observers measuring them from different inertial reference frames (i.e. explain the Principle of Relativity).
  • Use transformations from one reference frame to another to solve problems involving collisions.
  • Strategize about advanced ways to solve collision problems using reference frames and/or convertible kinetic energy.
